1. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
====================

A MESSAGE FROM THE MAYOR

The
Home Rule Charter
of the City of Cuero revised in 2014.

City Council Meetings
---------------------

* Second Monday of every month
* City Council Chamber in City Hall
  212 E Main St.
  Cuero, TX 77954
* A written request to appear before the council must be submitted by the second Friday of the month prior to the meeting. Submit requests to the
  [City Secretary](http://www.cityofcuero.com/index.aspx?nid=65)
  .
* City Hall is wheelchair-accessible and accessible parking spaces are available. Requests for accommodations and/or interpretive services must be made 48 hours prior to meeting.
* Contact
  [City Administration fo](http://www.cityofcuero.com/index.aspx?NID=218)
  r further information.
  Phone: 361-275-3476
  Fax: 361-275-6265

View
[Agendas and Minutes of the City Council](http://www.cityofcuero.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-Meetings-2)
.

* Councilmembers in Districts 2 and 3 are elected every two years in even-numbered years.
* Councilmembers in Districts 1 and 4 and at-large councilmembers are elected every two years in odd-numbered years.
* Mayor is elected every two years in even-numbered years.
* Elections are held on the first Saturday in May of each year.
* Please use the
  [District Map](http://www.cityofcuero.com/DocumentCenter/View/3575/District-Map-2023)
  to determine your council district.
